doc.field: Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings
Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings

Sears, Huntington, NY, 1979; Millstein Residence, 81st St., NYC, 1976; St. Vincent's Hospital, Seventh Ave., NYC, 1979; Doubleday, Fifth Ave., NYC, 1978; Life Sciences Building, Columbia University, 1981; W.N.E.T., Channel 13, 57th St., NYC, 1977 (3 folders); Tiffany, 57th St., 1979 (2 folders); "Miscellaneous" (2 folders): all circa 1960s: General Motors, National Geographic, Washington, DC; Fordham University; I.B.M.; Roosevelt Field Shopping Center; NYS Exhibition, World's Fair; Flushing Meadow Stadium; Noxema; American Bible Society; Hartford National Bank; Pfizer; Brooklyn Aquarium at Coney Island; Federal Reserve Bank; Middlesex Hospital; University Club; various residences; Caribe Hilton Hotel; Triboro Bridge; National Airlines at Rockefeller Center; R.C.A.
Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings
